scenario_text.value:
Hmm? This board in the ceiling looks loose.
I wonder if I can move it...

Oh! Look, we did it, Agumon! Now we can get
into the crawl space!

Did that child go through here? Can’t be
a ghost, then!

I want to go through here, but hmm... Do you
think it’s safe?

The enemy’s been using this crawl space too,
after all...

We don’t have time to look for another way.
Things’ll just get worse!

Yuck, there are tons of cobwebs here, too.
Still, no way through but forward!
